title: What am I Willing to Risk for an Honest Conversation? How and why I started this channel.
description:
It's been three years now since I started this project. Time to do some thinking and organizing about what I've learned about the church and evangelism. 

Pastor Comments on Jordan Peterson https://youtu.be/LZiVwwUdCjc
Conversation with Jordan Peterson https://youtu.be/aUGGrZUFMg4
Summary of the book of Daniel Video https://youtu.be/q1KcDsr8KZw
How Altars Work https://youtu.be/4GUw8Lztfuc
Fiery pillar, chariot of fire https://youtu.be/U1WaWatetg8
My blog: https://paulvanderklay.me
Prolegomena video https://youtu.be/LZiVwwUdCjc
Miracles by CS Lewis https://amzn.to/39fEemQ
CS Lewis Discarded Image https://amzn.to/3qRcmvk
The Language of Creation Matthieu Pageau https://amzn.to/2Mmcsfw
Jordan Peterson Suspender Video https://youtu.be/O-nvNAcvUPE
Jordan Peterson Biblical Series https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f-wWBGo6a2w&list=PL22J3VaeABQD_IZs7y60I3lUrrFTzkpat
Po the Person: Came for the Culture War Stayed for the Religion https://youtu.be/XK1Y3IBKAtE
Sally Jo Orthodoxy Protestantism https://youtu.be/gyxqkOr0TQA

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
